doc:
Arthur Brough https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Brough 0 Arthur Brough (born Frederick Arthur Baker; 26 February 1905 – 28 May 1978) was a British actor and theatre founder, producer and director best known for portraying the character of senior menswear salesman Ernest Grainger on the BBC sitcom Are You Being Served? Arthur_Brough ( born Frederick_Arthur_Baker ; 26_February_1905 – 28_May_1978 ) was a_British_actor_and_theatre_founder_,_producer_and_director best_known for portraying the_character of senior_menswear_salesman_Ernest_Grainger on the_BBC_sitcom Are You Being_Served ?
